channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:29 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.
item.description: 🟢 16:29 Dumping anxiety in the Chernihiv region. Since further reports.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 16:28 Driven to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.
